TopicTitle: Re-entry effect causes massive frame lag.

Articles.Content: Title says it all. When Mach effects or re-entry effect kick in, my frames drop significantly. If the game was running at 60 fps, with re-entry or mach it will run at less than 20, even with very small crafts. Please help?
Upgrading your GPU from "Cardboard with circuits painted on it" will help.

Upgrading your GPU from "Cardboard with circuits painted on it" will help.

I can assure you than my computer is more than capable of running KSP at high fps. It is only when re-entry effects show I get anomalous lag.
Could you tell us what CPU and GPU you have? I also suggest to just turn down the Atmospheric Effects under settings as low as they go.
Are you running any mods? I've experienced weird slowdowns in situations that never gave me slowdowns before installing the mods.

Go to the Settings menu. This option that we need is also in the in-flight "settings" window.

Find "Aerodynamic Effects Quality" or something like that. It should be a "slider."

Move the slider to your desired setting, then click Accept.

If you accessed this via the game menu, not the pause menu, the setting may be under Video or Graphics.

Good luck.
